Articles.Content:
Does anyone have a functional install of these two playing nicely together?
Doesn't matter if one uses SMURFF or RO.  (The former would probably be far easier to get working than the latter)  I just want a proper sized world with a shuttle that can get into orbit and do stuff. =)
I'm good with flying the thing.  I'm not as great with playing with config files or patches.
Any help would be most ...helpful.  =)

I know the author of SMURFF has (fairplay to him) no interest in supporting CA's shuttle.
I know that there are some config files that allow the CA shuttle to sort of work in RO, although they're outdated and the SRBs never quite made it anyway.
Seeing as I'm an idiot: where do I go from here?
